derivation_policy.description: Spin-based continuous control system for post-cushion parallel paths

spin_factor.notes: Spin contribution per tip unit depends on cushion length

residual.notes: Residual deviation from perfect parallel (0 is ideal)

notes: Interpolation of tip values is allowed and expected
Spin factor is determined solely by cushion length
Extrapolation beyond defined spin or residual bounds is forbidden
Residual tolerance defines acceptable near-parallel solutions
All numeric and geometric calculations are delegated to simulator layer
